original_text: And he shall sprinkle it seven times on him who is to be cleansed of the leprous disease. Then he shall pronounce him clean and shall let the living bird go into the open field.
korean_text: 나병에서 정결함을 받을 자에게 일곱 번 뿌려 정하다 하고 그 살아 있는 새는 들에 놓을지며

sentences.original_text: And he shall sprinkle it seven times
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것을 일곱 번 뿌릴 것입니다

sentences.original_text: on him who is to be cleansed of the leprous disease.
Then he shall pronounce him clean
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 그를 정결하다고 선언할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and shall let the living bird go into the open field.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 살아있는 새를 들에 놓아 줄 것입니다
